@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault

Package org.prebake.os

Abstractions for dealing with the operating system.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Interface Description
OperatingSystem Abstraction over ProcessBuilder to ease testing.
 

Class Summary
Class Description
OsProcess Abstracts away process management so we can build piping on top of ProcessBuilder or implement it natively if need be.
PipeFlusher Keeps external processes' pipes from getting clogged by shuttling bytes from one process's output stream to another process's input stream.
RealOperatingSystem An OperatingSystem that executes real processes.
 

Package org.prebake.os Description

Abstractions for dealing with the operating system.
